data.quote: In a conflict between the heart and the brain, follow your heart.
data.author: Swami Vivekananda

data.quote: In a day, when you don't come across any problems - you can be sure that you are travelling in a wrong path
data.author: Swami Vivekananda

data.quote: The greatest sin is to think yourself weak
data.author: Swami Vivekananda

data.quote: If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy, frequency and vibration.
data.author: Nikola Tesla

data.quote: Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more.
data.author: Nikola Tesla

data.quote: You will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: Those who know, do. Those that understand, teach.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: I am not afraid of an army of lions led by sheep; I am afraid of an army of sheep led by a lion.
data.author: Alexander The Great

data.quote: No one is free who has not obtained the empire of himself. No man is free who cannot command himself.
data.author: Pythagoras

data.quote: Educate the children and it won't be necessary to punish the men.
data.author: Pythagoras

data.quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.
data.author: Plato

data.quote: The heaviest penalty for declining to rule is to be ruled by someone inferior to yourself.
data.author: Plato

data.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: Strong minds discuss ideas, average minds discuss events, weak minds discuss people.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: By all means marry; if you get a good wife, you’ll become happy; if you get a bad one, you’ll become a philosopher.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: Be slow to fall into friendship, but when you are in, continue firm and constant.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: The Only Thing That Is Constant Is Change -
data.author: Heraclitus

data.quote: Much learning does not teach understanding.
data.author: Heraclitus

data.quote: Everything existing in the universe is the fruit of chance and necessity.
data.author: Democritus

data.quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.
data.author: Democritus

data.quote: Good means not merely not to do wrong, but rather not to desire to do wrong.
data.author: Democritus

data.quote: No one can defeat a powerful mind.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: Learn from the mistakes of others... you can't live long enough to make them all yourselves.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: The biggest guru-mantra is: never share your secrets with anybody. It will destroy you.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: Humbleness is at the root of self control.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Nature is pleased with simplicity. And nature is no dummy.
data.author: Isaac Newton
